directions: Heat oil over low heat, add onion, ginger, garlic and all the spices except the peppercorns and saute the masala till fragrant.
Add chillii, tomato, curry leaves, salt and chicken. Coat chicken with the masala and add 1 cup or more of water and cook chicken covered. Salt to taste.
When the chicken is done, add crushed pepper and serve immediately.
Note: Adjust water and spice as desired.
ingredients: 2 tbsp black or white peppercorns, coarsely crushed
1/4 tsp cumin powder or whole cumin
1/4 tsp fennel powder or whole fennel
title: Pepper and Coriander Chicken
